projects.name: CandyFM
highlights: Built a Java-based web application with metadata fetched from the Last.fm APIs and processed using the multithreaded approach (Java concurrency), 3 times faster than a single thread.
Used MVC pattern and Java Jetty/Servlets to build the web app and used Travis-ci and JUnit for testing.

Application features include but not limited: recommend similar songs by title, tags, or artist names, authentication, authorization, search history, popular searches, favorite songs, and partial search.
